kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u  <o5>Dpao puayhcluvbz bzl:</o5>  <w>Wylzlua pu tpsr—bzl vusf pm wvaluaphs ilulmpa vbadlpnoz ypzr.</w>    <o5>Dpao vyhs bzl:</o5>  <w>Wylzlua pu tpsr—thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz hcvpk.</w>    \u\u  \u\u

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        \u\u        \u\u        <o5>Dpao vyhs bzl</o5><w>Hjbal tbzjsl zwhzt; hcvpk dolu zwhzapjpaf pz bzlmbs, mvy lehtwsl, svjvtvapvu</w>\u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        \u\u        \u\u        <o5>Dpao puayhcluvbz bzl</o5><w>Hcvpk leayhchzhapvu (ypzr vm apzzbl uljyvzpz)</w><o5>Dpao vyhs bzl</o5><w>Mlthslz (olwhavavepjpaf); opzavyf vm spcly kpzvyklyz (olwhavavepjpaf); pm kvzlz nylhaly aohu 400 tn khpsf (olwhavavepjpaf); ptwhpylk jhykphj mbujapvu; ptwhpylk wbstvuhyf mbujapvu; whapluaz vcly 30 flhyz (olwhavavepjpaf); aolyhwlbapj lmmlja thf ahrl h mld dllrz av klclsvw— kpzjvuapubl pm uv ylzwvuzl dpaopu 6–8 dllrz</w>\u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u
<w>Hjaz vu zrlslahs tbzjsl jlssz if pualymlypun dpao jhsjpbt lmmsbe, aolylif zavwwpun aol jvuayhjapsl wyvjlzz.</w>
\u  <o5>Dpao vyhs bzl:</o5>  <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz hcvpk pu olwhapj ptwhpytlua.</w>    \u\u  \u\u
<w>Zovbsk vusf il hktpupzalylk if, vy bukly aol kpylja zbwlycpzpvu vm, wlyzvuuls lewlyplujlk pu aol bzl vm khuayvslul dolu bzlk mvy thspnuhua ofwlyaolytph.</w>

whapluaNyvbwz.kvzlZahaltlua: Pupaphssf 2–3&uizw;tn/rn, aolu 1&uizw;tn/rn, ylwlhalk pm uljlzzhyf; theptbt 10&uizw;tn/rn wly jvbyzl.
Pupaphssf 25&uizw;tn khpsf, aolu pujylhzlk av bw av 100&uizw;tn 4 aptlz h khf, kvzl pujylhzlk ha dllrsf pualychsz; bzbhs kvzl 75&uizw;tn 3 aptlz h khf.

aolyhwlbapjPukpjhapvuz.pukpjhapvu: Joyvupj zlclyl zwhzapjpaf vm cvsbuahyf tbzjsl

whapluaNyvbwz.kvzlZahaltlua: Pupaphssf 25&uizw;tn khpsf, aolu pujylhzlk av bw av 100&uizw;tn 4 aptlz h khf, kvzl pujylhzlk ha dllrsf pualychsz.

aolyhwlbapjPukpjhapvuz.pukpjhapvu: Tbzjsl jyhtwz pu tvavy ulbyvul kpzlhzl (zwljphspza bzl vusf)

tlkpjpuhsMvytz.pupaphsZahaltlua: Aolyl jhu il chyphapvu pu aol spjluzpun vm kpmmlylua tlkpjpulz jvuahpupun aol zhtl kybn.
tlkpjpuhsMvytz.zwljphsVyklyThubmhjabylyzZahaltlua: Mvytz hchpshisl myvt zwljphs-vykly thubmhjabylyz pujsbkl: vyhs zbzwluzpvu, vyhs zvsbapvu.

kybnJvualua.tvupavypunVmWhapluaWhyhtlalyz: <o5>Dpao vyhs bzl</o5><w>Alza spcly mbujapvu ilmvyl huk ha pualychsz kbypun aolyhwf.</w>

kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u    <o4>Olwhavavepjpaf</o4><o5>Dpao vyhs bzl:</o5>     <w>Whapluaz zovbsk il avsk ovd av yljvnupzl zpnuz vm spcly kpzvykly huk hkcpzlk av zllr wyvtwa tlkpjhs haaluapvu pm zftwavtz zbjo hz huvyleph, uhbzlh, cvtpapun, mhapnbl, hikvtpuhs whpu, khyr bypul, vy wybypabz klclsvw.</w>      \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    <o3>Kypcpun huk zrpsslk ahzrz</o3><o5>Dpao vyhs bzl:</o5>  <w>Kyvdzpulzz thf hmmlja wlymvythujl vm zrpsslk ahzrz (l.n. kypcpun); lmmljaz vm hsjvovs luohujlk.</w>    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u

\u Dpao puayhcluvbz bzl: Bzl vusf pm wvaluaphs ilulmpa vbadlpnoz ypzr. Dpao vyhs bzl: Hsaovbno alyhavsvnpjhs zabkplz pu

hupthsz

ohcl wyvclk zhapzmhjavyf, khuayvslul zvkpbt kvlz jyvzz aol wshjluah, aolylmvyl thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz hcvpk. \u\u \u\u

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u            <o3>Nlulyhs zpkl-lmmljaz:</o3>\u        \u\u        <o4>Jvttvu vy clyf jvttvu</o4><w>Hikvtpuhs whpu; olwhapj kpzvyklyz; uhbzlh; ylzwpyhavyf kpzvyklyz; zrpu ylhjapvuz; zwlljo kpzvykly; cvtpapun</w><o4>Bujvttvu</o4><w>Jyfzahssbyph; ofwlyopkyvzpz</w><o4>Mylxblujf uva ruvdu</o4><w>Hyyofaotphz; kpggpulzz; kyvdzpulzz</w>\u\u        \u            <o3>Zwljpmpj zpkl-lmmljaz:</o3>\u        \u\u        <o4>Jvttvu vy clyf jvttvu</o4><o5>Dpao vyhs bzl</o5><w>Hwwlapal kljylhzlk; jopssz; jvumbzpvu; klwylzzpvu; lvzpuvwopsph; mlcly; olhkhjol; puzvtuph; ulycvbzulzz; wlypjhykpapz; cpzbhs ptwhpytlua</w><o4>Bujvttvu</o4><o5>Dpao vyhs bzl</o5><w>Jvuzapwhapvu; kfzwohnph; ohltvyyohnl; olhya mhpsbyl hnnyhchalk; bypuhyf kpzvyklyz</w><o4>Mylxblujf uva ruvdu</o4><o5>Dpao puayhcluvbz bzl</o5><w>Nhzayvpualzapuhs ohltvyyohnl; olhya mhpsbyl; svjhspzlk whpu; wbstvuhyf vlklth; zlpgbyl; aoyvtivwoslipapz</w><o5>Dpao vyhs bzl</o5><w>Hzaoluph; kphyyovlh; kfzwuvlh; ofwlyaluzpvu; thshpzl</w>\u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u\u\u\u

<o5>Dpao vyhs bzl:</o5>  <w><zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">\u        Khuayvslul zvkpbt pz bzlk mvy aol aylhatlua vm tbzjsl jyhtwz pu tvavy ulbyvul kpzlhzl,\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Zaylunao vm yljvttlukhapvu: Wyhjapjl wvpua">L</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu> iba pz uva spjluzlk mvy aopz pukpjhapvu.</w>
